title: Compute mean ticket cost for musical performance

content.description:
The number of tickets purchased by a customer for a musical performance at a certain concert hall can be considered a random variable. The table below shows the relative frequency distribution for the number of tickets purchased by a customer.

Suppose each ticket for a certain musical performance cost $12.
content.question: Based on the distribution shown, what is the mean cost per customer for the performance?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

topic.text: 4.8: Mean and Standard Deviation of Random Variables

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
